Plot of DGP model parameter traces

Source: R/training.R
trace_plot.Rd

This function plots the traces of model parameters of a particular GP node in the trained DGP hierarchy.

Usage

trace_plot(
  obj,
  layer_no,
  ker_no,
  width = 4,
  height = 1,
  ticksize = 5,
  labelsize = 8,
  hspace = 0.1
)

Arguments

obj

The DGP object produced by train() function.

layer_no

the index of the interested layer.

ker_no

the index of the interested GP in the layer specified by layer_no.

width

the overall plot width. Defaults to 4.

height

the overall plot height. Defaults to 1.

ticksize

the size of sub-plot ticks. Defaults to 5.

labelsize

the font size of y labels. Defaults to 8.

hspace

the space between sub-plots. Defaults to 0.1.
